name: The Creeping Feature
description:
Creep your way through ambitious developers , who keep suggesting new features instead of working.

Controls: A/← and D/→

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023.

Theme: Roots

==========================

As we all know,  feature creep is a big enemy of every developer. We want feature over feature, it's never enough, and the scope of our project grows so much that making it becomes impossible.

Now you are the feature creep! Hit as many developers as you can, making them add new features and bloating their game, growing the time for completion to an astronomical amount of years.

==========================

Made by team B-Roots:

  • Pietro
